div.p:
Curia Capitalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem primo die mensis Octobris Anno Domino millesimo quadringentesimo
nonagesimo Octauo Quo die sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo secte

Eeodem die Johannes Ruthirfurde miles Electus fuit in
officium prepositure huius burgi pro anno Instante per totim totum consilium
et Communitatem eiusdem prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Jacobus Collisone Andreas Cullan senior thomas
leslie et Richardus Waus Electi fuerunt in Officium balliuorum pro anno
Instante prestito solitis Juramentis

Eodem philippus Dunbrek Willelmus Scrimgeour' Andreas
nachtie et Jacobus leis Electj fuerunt in officium sergeandorum
pro anno Instante prestitis Juramentis

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Alexandri comitis buchane
div.p:
Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene primo die mensis Octobris
anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo octauo Coram honorabilibus viris
Johanne Ruthirfurd milite ac preposito Andrea cullan thoma leslie et Ricardo
Waus tribus balliuorum dicti burgi In pretorio eiusdem pro tribunali In curia capitali
sedentibus per subscriptum videlicet Robertum blinseile alexandrum chamer' Alexandrum rede
thomam prat Johannem Collisone Johannem Wormet Willelmum chamer' Willelmum
blinseile Andream cullan Juniorem alexandrum mar' Johannem mar' matheum branche
et patricium chernsid burgenses dicti burgi Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam
Jacobus steuart Comes buchanie pater alexandri steuart latoris presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et Sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de quadam terra siue tenemento tam anteriore quam Interiore cum suis
pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Johannis stevinsone ex australi ex vna
et terram quondam thome chamer ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias
regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod dictus alexander est legitimus
et propinquior heres dicti quondam Jacobi patris suj de dicta terra siue tenemento
cum pertinenciis Et quod est legitime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nuc nunc
per annum Et valuit xxx s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit
in manibus domini nostri Regis per decessum dicti quondam Jacobi per
vnum mensem aut eocirca in defectu veri heredes Jus suum hucusque
minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub sigillo dicti thome leslie
vnius balliuorum dicti burgi et sigillis quorundam qui huic Inquisicioni
Intererant faciend' anno die et loco prenotatis

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid liell procurator honorabili virj domini
Johannis Ruthirfurde militis et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu quatuordecim solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam henricj tulideff ex orientali ex vna et torrentem
a lacu ad molendinum aqueductum distenden' vers ex occidentali
partibus ab altera et terram dicti militis versus austrum et communionem viam regiam
versus boream ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram accedens nichil reperit d et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Roberto piper et thoma logy et Jacobo leis sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid liell procurator magistri
themannj crab et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu quadraginta denariorum sibi debit' annuatim de quadam terra vasta quondam
Robertj club Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
inter terram q' quondam Duncanj clat ex orientali ex vna et terram
quondam henricj tulideff ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram
accedens nichill reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus
Roberto pipar thoma logy et Jacobo leis sergeando

The saide day William Wormet procurator for mastir Androw cadiow
Solemptlie protestit that quhat that Isabele of Cullane did'
anent ane pece of Westland' liand in the hukarstarraw processit
and recovuerit be ward and dome suld' nocht turne thie said mastir
Androw cadiow to nay preiudice nor' skathtis

The saide day mathoue branche in the name' of Jonhne honysone
protestit solempnitlie that quhat was done in the name of master'
Androw Caidiow anent the process' of ane pece of wast liand'
in hukstarraw suld turne the saide Jonhne to na preiudice

Eeodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Willelmus crukschank
Capellanus ac procurator altaris Sancti Duthacj infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati
nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu octo solidorum sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore
debit' et non solut' de quadam terra wasta Jacente in vico nauium
ex ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter
Ad quam terram accedens nichill reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam secundo huius processus Testibus Roberto pipar thoma logy
et Jacobo leis seriando

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quinto die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo octauo

Alexander menyeis
Robert blinsel
Alexander R'R' overwrites another letter. There is also a now superfluous tilde above the word.ed'
Alexander chamer
Jonhne Cullane
Dauid menyeis
Jonhne Colisone
Thomas prat
Jonhne Wormet
Alexander gray
Williame blinsel
Androw murray eldar
Williame futhes
Williame chamer
Dauid mar'

div.head: Appreciatores Carnium
div.p:
thomas Waus Johannes chamer thomas Watsone Willelmus
andirsone senior Dauid spens Jacobus Kennartj Willelmus andirsone
Jacobi Willelmus murray Johannes thomsone Willelmus goldsmyth
thomas Chapman Andreas murray Junior' patricius Chernside
Johannes stevinsone patricius leslie et Johannes Wil yongsone

div.head: Gustatores seruicie
div.p:
Evine quarter philippus Dunbrek seriandus
Willelmus spruty et Alexander Stablar'
Crukit quarter Andreas nachtj sergeandus
Nicholaius bewmonde et Johannes blak
grene quarter Jacobus leis sergeandus
hugo tode et Willelmus Dunbrek
ffuty quarter Willelmus scrimgeor seriandus
Robertus austeane Johannes Colly et

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Octauo die mensis octobris quosupra

The saide day Alexander sanchar' grantit hyme borght
for tua franche crownis to Alexander prat for the barone of
Kikawok quhilkis the bailyeis chargeit hyme to pay
within terme of law

The saide day the borgh strekit be patrik Dous'
apone alexander Camrone for the wrangwis' away takin
and withhalding fra hyme of ane brokat hid was fundyne
of nane awaile be ane suorne assis' William blinseill
forspekar for the quhilkis the saide patrik was in amerciament of the
Court and the saide Alexander quyt of his Chalang

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
nono die octobris

The saide day it was statut be the aldirman bailyeis
and Counsaile present for the tyme that thir personis mage still
mage scot Jonet browne the wif of Robert flessar the
wif of Jonhne the hay Canny Waus
sal mak and furnys' gud sufficient Candillis small
wekis weill dryit the pund for thre d' quhile the
aldirman and Counsall be forthir awisit and haue candill redy
to sell to ale mane vndir the pane of law

Eodem die thomas Waus deuenit plegius legalis quod patricius
Rede erit Indempnes pro gilberto menyeis aliter quam per viam Juris
et Willelmus porter deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus gilbertus erit Indempnes pro
Eodem die patricio aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum
parcium obligatur per manuum ostensionem ad conseruandum suos plegios indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die
Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne' assis' Jonhne
Collisone forspeker that Jonhne stevinsone sall content ande pay
to the videw of Robert of Cullane sex barellis of Rymeill eftir
the tenour of the saidez Jonhnez writt and be his tonge grant
quhilkis the bailyeis chargit hyme to pay within terme of law

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
Jonhne Collisone forspekar that Jonhne stevinsone sall preive
with malcum crage ande patrik chernside that the saide malcum
gef full power of his lastage as he that was ane frauchtisman
to William of gareaucht to the saide Jonhne stevinsone' or he departit out of Abirdene that
being done we fynde the saide Jonhne stevinsonnys borgh'
of waile and the saide William gareaucht to releiff the saide
Jonhne stevinsone of the vj barellis of meill Neuire the les'
gif the saide Williame gareaucht pruffis or has deliuerit
malcum of cragis haile lastage he salbe quyt and quhat he
falys tharof he sall releive the saide Jonhne stevinsone in
ale or in part of the saide sex barellis

The xv day of october' the yer' forsaid' the aldirman deliuerit
to the balyeis xviij pundis of the xxiij li' of the taxt resauit
fra Androw Cullane and Richerd Waus balyeis and fiwe lib'
of the saide xxiij li' exponit tharof xx s' to ane pursevant of the
kingis and the Remanent in vthir necessar thingis And' atour the aldirman
chargit the balyeis in the kingis name and the tovnis to deliuer
the taxt agan to the merchandmen of the tone and tharof he askit
Instrument befor' thir witnes Robert blinsele alexander Rede Jonhne Colisone
Jonhne Wormet and diuers' of the Counsal

The saide day the aldirman gaf in his expensis in writ
quhilkis he hed' exponit and deliuerit in thar' vys' and at commavnd'
of the haill tone quhilkis was rede in presence of the Consale
considerit and vndirstandin Ande ale thingis being allouit the
tone restis aving to the aldirman fyftene pundis xj s' and
iiij d' de claro to the pament of saide Some the consal hale present
for the tym oblist tham be the fathtis of thar bodiis and the aldirmanis expensis mad
in edinburghe that tyme with alexander menyes nocht allouit in this some

The saide day the towne restis aving to sere Jonhne strathachin
xxxj s' at martimes next to Cum al thingis bigan being allowit' et cetera

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' vthiris of the consale
present for the tyme grantit to mavnys belman xx s' to by
him ane pee for to pas' Ilkan monunday throw the tone
in the morning to name and pray for the saulis gevin him in bile
as vys' and wont is and has bene tymes bigan
